New-York Historical Society collection of caricatures and cartoons

Above: McKinley & Co. Counter for the Rich. Counter for the Working Man. Below: The Two Counters. "It is the shopping women who has done this ." - Ex-Speaker Reed referring to the great democratic victories of 1890. [Tariff reform, taxation]

Above: McKinley & Co. Counter for the Rich. Counter for the Working Man. Below: The Two Counters. "It is the shopping women who has done this ." - Ex-Speaker Reed referring to the great democratic victories of 1890. [Tariff reform, taxation]
2 copies. Pen drawing. By D.E. Cronin. Sketch for the Philadelphia Record. One copy from The Philadelphia Record, Saturday, October 22, 1892.
